message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000. Considering its high quality and the benefits it will bring to you, I would like to propose a special introductory price of $7,200. This offer is exclusive to you and is designed to ensure you receive the best value possible. Please let me know if this proposal suits your budget, and we can proceed with the transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.
